package.name: Hellodialog_Tracker
package.summary: Connect your Magento shop to Hellodialog.
package.description:
This plugin connects your Magento shop to Hellodialog. Your customers will automatically be subscribed to your Hellodialog account.
Optionally use the Hellodialog eCommerce Plugin to target groups of customers based on their purchase history.
package.notes:
This plugin connects your Magento shop to Hellodialog. Your customers will automatically be subscribed to your Hellodialog account. Optionally use the Hellodialog eCommerce Plugin to target groups of customers based on their purchase history.
Release 2.0.1 contains a number of fixes, as well as an update to the underlying API domain used.
Release 2.0.0 was completely rebuilt from scratch. The most important changes: - Made the importing of orders with customers optional - Fieldmapping: specify which Magento fields to import into Hellodialog - Synchronize history of all completed orders
For any questions or when you need help installing our extension, please contact us at support@hellodialog.com or call us at +31 23 53 22 608.
